roleset.name: win over some competitor

example.name: election
example.text: The 72-year-old leader of the right wing Likud Party is expected to trounce Ehud Barak in the upcoming election for Prime Minister.
example.arg: The 72-year-old leader of the right wing Likud Party
in the upcoming election for Prime Minister.

roleset.note: TROUNCE-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from trounce.01-v)
